entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.8°C

Visibility: 4.8 km

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:06 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:06 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
